bvngeeaddons.config.creativeInteractCaul: No more bottles or buckets added to your inventory when interacting with cauldrons in creative! Idea: schmoe_mc
bvngeeaddons.config.removeAutoJumpButton: Removes the Auto Jump button and disables Auto Jump. Cuz why the fuck not?
bvngeeaddons.config.bossBarRenderMode.co: Compact renders only 1 boss bar + total boss count, None disables boss bars entirely
